text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, Israelian akurazɨ me mɨdorozim gamua uan apaniba abɨnigha, atrivim sara suiraghav a mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Me nguibar ekiamɨn aven itir adarasi, tarazi ataghizɨ me itir puvatɨ. Me bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. A Jerikon atrivim gamizir arazir kamra, uaghan Lipnan atrivim gami.
